lyrics:
15 contributorsi stand corrected lyricsverse 1
youve been checking on my facts

in doublescreening what i say

lord knows i havent tried ill take my stand
one last time
forget the protocol ill take your hand
right in mine
see vampire weekend liveget tickets as low as 73you might also likechorus
